original_text: And they have not cried unto me with their heart, when they howled upon their beds: they assemble themselves for corn and wine, and they rebel against me.
korean_text: 성심으로 나를 부르지 아니하였으며 오직 침상에서 슬피 부르짖으며 곡식과 새 포도주로 말미암아 모이며 나를 거역하는도다

sentences.original_text: And they have not cried unto me
when they howled upon their beds
they assemble themselves for corn and wine
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 곡식과 포도주를 얻기 위해 모이고
